name: irhydra
description: IRHydra is an in-browser tool that can display V8 and Dart VM compilation artifacts (namely intermediate representations and native code) dumped during optimization.

scripts.build_hydra_debug: cd irhydra && pub build --mode debug && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build_hydra_debug && npm run build_tsc
scripts.build_ret: npm run build_hydra && npm run build_tsc
